p: The device we used was Huatuo Electronic Acupuncture Treatment Instrument SDZ-II (Suzhou Medical Supplies Factory Co., Ltd., Registration number 20172270675), and the frequency was set on 20/100Hz (20Hz 5s, 100Hz 10s). The other parameters such as intensity are set according to the actual experience of the patients, taking the patient's discomfort as the upper limit.
